Class.name: EasyCSP.Validator.Validators.PhoneNumber
Class.Description: Strip punctuation and spaces then check for 10 digits.

Method.name: run
Method.Implementation:
attribute = @ME->init(parameters) if attribute->hasErrors() then return attribute
value = attribute->value
convert "()-." to "" in value if len(oconv(value, "MCN")) = 10 then attribute->addError("A phone number must have 10 numeric digits. Punctuation is optional and ignored.") end
return attribute
